resources.string:
Meruvian Foundation is a non profit organization that is dedicate to develop people skill to filling the skillset of people to get a global standard and bring influencing to their ecosystem. We facilitates the efforts of private sector entities to support the development of national education through their CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) programs by managing their CSR funds.We also provide Human Resource Development to close the gap between industries and educations, which stronger in this millenium. As one of the biggest Java Research Centre in Indonesia.We have dedicated of our research product for support Open Source program in Indonesia.Now we have some products which ready to use for your bussiness 
 
 Our Services:

(Foundation)

(Education)

Meruvian midas adalah sebuah sebuah project open source di gunakan untuk memudahkan mendesain layout di android dengan mudah. di project ini sudah di sediakan contoh-contoh layout, drawable, dan variable-variable xml seperti color dimension dll.
Dalam soal terdiri 4 ( Empat ) buah pilihan jawaban di kanan dan di kiri, untuk cara pengisiannya anda tinggal memilih satu jawaban di kanan dan satu jawaban di kiri. Contoh :
